import React, {Component, useState} from 'react'; import { ListGroup, ListGroupItem, Badge } from 'reactstrap'; class TopHeader extends Component { state = { activeId: null // nothing selected by default, but this is up to you... } handleClick(event, id) { this.setState({ activeId: id }) } render(){ const [active, setActive]= useState(false); return(
setActive(!active)}> {active ? "X" : "menu"}

); } } export default TopHeader;
